text: General Secretary Xi Jinping important speech series is a book of the sayings of Xi Jinping, the current General Secretary of the Communist Party of China, published in 2014 and 2016. The book is a collection of quotations taken from Xi Jinping's speeches. The book was written by Party's Publicity Department and published by official People's Publishing House and Study Publishing House. Party's Organization Department ordered to communist staffs and university students must study this book and learn General Secretary's talking spirit. ==Related pages== * The Little Red Book == Reference == Category:Chinese literature Category:Political books Category:Xi Jinping Category:2014 books
title: General Secretary Xi Jinping important speech series
